channel.title: CiTR -- The Canadian Way (2010)
channel.description: Canadian independent music from any given genre from all across our massive and talented country.
channel.itunes:summary: Canadian independent music from any given genre from all across our massive and talented country.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: All independent. All styles. All Canadian. All way. Got it? Good.

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast vol.2 #16) - Broadcast on January 27, 2010
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired January 27, 2010 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. This week's show features in-studio guest Vern Beamish of China Syndrome!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - January 27, 2010 *Today's in-studio guest, Vern Beamish of China Syndrome!*

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast vol.2 #15) - Broadcast on January 13, 2010
item.description: The first Canadian Way of 2010! The Canadian Way, aired January 13, 2010 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - January 13, 2010

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast vol.2 #14) - Broadcast on December 30, 2009
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired December 30, 2009 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. CiTR debut by East Vamps. Also, a sampling of some of Spike's favorite releases of 2009, including tracks from Plex, Kidnap Kids!, CHAR2D2, Said the Whale, The SSRIs, Meatdraw, Apollo Ghosts, You Say Party! We Say Die!, Young Galaxy, Dog Day, The Precious Fathers, Carolyn Mark & N.Q. Arbuckle, and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - December 30, 2009 *Best Releases of 2009*

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast vol.2 #13) - Broadcast on December 16, 2009
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired December 16, 2009 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. CiTR debut by Apollo Ghosts from Eggnong Experience compilation.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - December 16, 2009

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast vol.2 #12) - Broadcast on December 2, 2009
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired December 2, 2009 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. In recognition of Discorder's The Best of the Decade, ranking the 50 best local bands of the '00s, Spike brings you the 10 bands he nominated as a juror. The 10 Best Bands of the Decade include: kids these days, The Rebel Spell, The Pack (A.D.), Fun 100, Blood Meridian, Operation Makeout, Pride Tiger, The Evaporators, Bison B.C., and the Basement Sweets.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - December 2, 2009 *The 10 Best Bands of the Decade Special*

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast vol.2 #11) - Broadcast on November 18, 2009
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired November 18, 2009 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. This week's show, a special edition Funding Drive broadcast, features in-studio guests Charla McCutcheon and Eric Breitenbach of CHAR2D2!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - November 18, 2009 *Today's in-studio guests, Charla McCutcheon and Eric Breitenbach of CHAR2D2!*

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast vol.2 #5) - Broadcast on August 12, 2009
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired August 12, 2009 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. Features a spotlight on bands playing at this year's Olio Festival, including The Choir Practice, Fake Shark Real Zombie and The Clips (RIP).
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - August 12, 2009

item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - July 29, 2009

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast vol.2 #3) - Broadcast on July 15, 2009
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired July 15, 2009 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. The Polaris Prize Short List Special spotlights the 10 finalists for the coveted Canadian independent music award: Elliott Brood, Fucked Up, Great Lake Swimmers, Hey Rosetta!, K'NAAN, Malajube, Metric, Joel Plaskett, Chad VanGaalen and Patrick Watson.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - July 15, 2009 *The Polaris Music Prize 'Short List' Special*

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast vol.2 #2) - Broadcast on July 1, 2009
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired July 1, 2009 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. The *Canada-riffic* Canada Day Special features songs about Canada and the Canadian experience by such fellow Canadians as Joel Plaskett, Rheostatics, Kinnie Starr, Carolyn Mark, The Evaporators, Classified, The Weakerthans, The Hanson Brothers, Arrogant Worms, Local Anxiety, Subhumans, dbs, The Kingpins, Mr. Right & Mr. Wrong (NoMeansNo), The Cleats, Stan Rogers, the Hard Core Logo Soundtrack, Chixdiggit, and everyone's favourite hosers, Bob & Doug McKenzie.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - July 1, 2009 *The 'Canada-riffic' Canada Day Special*

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast vol.2 #1) - Broadcast on June 17, 2009
item.description: The Canadian Way's podcast makes its triumphant return (thus the 'vol.2' tag) with a special broadcast spotlighting some of the 40 nominees to make the Polaris Music Prize's long list, including: Arkells, Beast, Bell Orchestre, Bison B.C., Bruce Peninsula, Elliott Brood, Fucked Up, Hey Rosetta!, Junior Boys, K'Naan, Land of Talk, One Hundred Dollars, Snailhouse, Charles Spearin, Wolf Parade, Women and Woodpigeon. Aired June 17, 2009 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - June 17, 2009 *The Polaris Music Prize 'Long List' Special*

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast #27) - Broadcast on October 5, 2007
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired October 5, 2007 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. This week's show, a special edition Funding Drive broadcast, is hosted by fill-in Jonathan B. of CiTRs Disasterpiece Theatre. (note: due to technical problems, actual podcast begins at about the 45-minute mark)
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - October 5, 2007 *With guest host, Jonathan B.!*

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast #17) - Broadcast on July 27, 2007
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired July 27, 2007 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. This week's show features in-studio guest Tim Chan of China Syndrome (and formerly of Victoria power popsters, 64 Funnycars)! CiTR debut from The Jolly Llamas and The Big Bad. (note: due to technical problems, actual podcast begins at about the 29-minute mark)
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - July 27, 2007 *Today's in-studio guest, Tim Chan of China Syndrome!*

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast #15) - Broadcast on July 13, 2007
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired July 13, 2007 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. This week's show features in-studio guests Dusty Shots and Lou Slips from The Hits, Maya Miller and Becky Black from The Pack, and local promoter Jay Chetwynd from Smokin' Entertainment! CiTR debuts from Ghost House and Mohawk Lodge.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - July 13, 2007 *Today's in-studio guests, The Hits and The Pack!*

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast #14) - Broadcast on July 6, 2007
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired July 6, 2007 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. CiTR debuts on this episode from Children of Celebrities, Lola Duotronic, Wax Mannequin, Under Pressure, Sex with Strangers and The United Steelworkers of Montreal. The Canadian Way exclusive from The Hermit.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - July 6, 2007

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast #13) - Broadcast on June 29, 2007
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired June 29, 2007 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. This week's show features call-in interviews with Carolyn Mark and Caila Thompson of Shapes and Sizes! CiTR debuts from Kick in the Eye, The Hermit, Baby Control and Trophy.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - June 29, 2007 *Today's call-in guests, Carolyn Mark and Caila Thompson!*

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast #12) - Broadcast on June 22, 2007
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired June 22, 2007 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. This week's show features an interview with MarQuo and Skoty B of Go Ghetto Tiger and their pals Andrew and Mark of Castle Grey Skull! CiTR debuts from Two Hours Traffic, Ohbijou, Hot Little Rocket and Castle Grey Skull, and a Canadian Way exclusive from Rebekah Higgs.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - June 22, 2007 *Today's in-studio guests, Go Ghetto Tiger and Castle Grey Skull!*

item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - June 15, 2007 *With guest host, Jonathan B.!*

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast #10) - Broadcast on June 8, 2007
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired June 8, 2007 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. With guest Amber Webber (of Black Mountain and Dream on Dreary), who will talk about her new side project with Black Mountain bandmate Joshua Wells, called Lightning Dust. There will be new tracks from their self-titled debut, which made its CiTR debut on last week's show. Also tracks from Amber's other projects, past and present, including Pink Mountaintops.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - June 8, 2007 *Today's call-in guest, Amber Webber!*

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast #9) - Broadcast on June 1, 2007
item.description: The Canadian Way, aired June 1, 2007 on CiTR 101.9fm in Vancouver. CiTR debuts on this episode from Lightning Dust, Immaculate Machine, Rebekah Higgs and Metric. The Canadian Way exclusives from bel riose, Rick White Album, They Shoot Horses, Don't They? and Paul Reddick.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - June 1, 2007

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast #8) - Broadcast on May 25, 2007

item.title: The Canadian Way (podcast debut!) - Broadcast on April 6, 2007
item.description: This week's edition of The Canadian Way features a farewell to Etobicoke, Onatario's favourite sons, Rheostatics. Rheos classic songs and covers of Rheos tunes by the greatest of IndieCan, from a new compilation, "Rheostatics Tribute: The Secret Sessions.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Canadian Way - April 6, 2007 *Podcast debut & Rheostatics Wake*
